humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the maximum tumor diameter for the invasive lobular carcinoma, which is 2.7 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this pathology report, the maximum tumor diameter is specified as 2.7 cm. According to the TNM staging system for breast cancer, a T2 stage is assigned to tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not greater than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
